creator: javaexprt@yahoo.com
text:
Hello everybody. 
I am finding that it is a challenge to accomplish the following task:  to get 
WIN32 binaries with SSL and JK2 connector  with jkjni.dll , so that Apache can 
start Tomcat automatically.
 On your official download side there is Win32 with no SSL. 
I have searched the internet for a few days and found Apache binary with SSL, 
but it is in form of EXE, (not MSI Installer) , I found JK2 connector DLLs, but 
I can not find jkjni.dll anywhere.  I am a Java programmer and I do not have 
C++ compiler. 
Currently I do not know what to do about it.
Can you please post all of these components on one side, so it can be ready to 
use. Hunting for all those components is very time consuming and frustrating.
Your help is greatly appreciated.
Thanks

creator: mturk@apache.org
text:
Official binaries with SSL support depends on US politics (at least they did), 
but since the kerberos can be downloaded from MIT site for year or so, I see no 
reason why we cannot have a 'official' SSL distribution.

Anyhow, this question has to be put to https guys.
